rows.label: qev014406_MSG0001
rows.name: This alarm means something's wrong with the plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0002
rows.name: Is it those creatures again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0003
rows.name:
*huff* *gasp* That...
That was one of those things that attacked us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0004
rows.name:
Those cocoons...
It hatched out of one of them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0005
rows.name:
I can't take this anymore. I can't. Ian, where are you?
Where'd everyone go? I want to go back to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_JNK0010
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev014406_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Ajoa to stay strong.

rows.label: qev014406_JNK0020
rows.name: Show

rows.label: qev014406_SEL0021
rows.name:
Show Ajoa one of the ID cards
you collected from the creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0006
rows.name:
R-right... Thank you. I'm really glad you're here.
I owe Rosie for that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0007
rows.name:
We need to get at that surveillance data and see where
everyone went.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0008
rows.name:
Did you see Ian outside? His ID card is the only one
with viewing access to the security system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0009
rows.name:
This...this is one of their ID cards.
So those things...ate everyone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh God. Oh God, I just... No. I can't freak out now.
We need to get at that camera footage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0011
rows.name:
But Ian had the only ID card with viewing access for the
security system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0012
rows.name:
Wait, that's... You have Ian's ID card.
Did it come from that monster too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0013
rows.name: We can get at the camera data with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0014
rows.name: Sorryâ€”could you maybe look at it instead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0015
rows.name: I don't feel so well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm just going to go take a quick shower.
Is...that okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_JNK0030
rows.name: Allow

rows.label: qev014406_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Ajoa to go ahead and freshen up.

rows.label: qev014406_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev014406_SEL0041
rows.name:
Point out to Ajoa how sick she looks,
and convince her to stick around.

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0017
rows.name:
Thanks. Here's Ian's ID card back.
You can access the data from that terminal there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0018
rows.name:
The shower's just a single door, so if anything happens
I'll yell, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0019
rows.name:
And I'm not shy, so if something goes really weird,
just barge on in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0020
rows.name:
Really? I mean, I just feel so sweaty and gross and...
wrong. But if you say so, I trust your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0021
rows.name:
Right, okay. Let's take a look. Here...
Stick Ian's ID card in that terminal there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0022
rows.name:
Why is my skin so dry...? It's like it's peeling off...
I really need a shower...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0023
rows.name: I'm so thirsty... And my skin feels like it's drying up...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0024
rows.name: I'm burning up. I think I have a fever...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0025
rows.name:
So the reason I crave water is because of...whatever is
planted inside me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0026
rows.name:
Is this what happened to the others?
Were those things... Was that them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_JNK0050
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev014406_SEL0051
rows.name: Express concern for Ajoa's condition.

rows.label: qev014406_JNK0060
rows.name: Suspect

rows.label: qev014406_SEL0061
rows.name: Stay wary and watch for signs of transformation.

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0027
rows.name: You're not...afraid of me? You're very kind...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0028
rows.name:
R-right... As long as I avoid water, the docs in
New LA can hopefully remove that thing's eggs
before they...hatch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0029
rows.name: Please don't stare at me like that. I can't stand it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0030
rows.name:
As long as I don't drink anything, the...
the eggs shouldn't hatch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0031
rows.name:
If the doctors in New LA can remove them from my
body, I...should be all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014406_MSG0032
rows.name: I'm going back now. Please let Rosie know I'm okay.[ST:wait ]
